text: 3:13 Ua Me Ini 3:6; 3:15; Matyu 22:32; Luk 23:13-25; Aposel 2:23; 7:32Abraham ko Aisak ko Jekopɨn God, a en inazir afeziabar God, a uan ingangarir gumazim Iesus bar a pɨrafa. Ia, an aremeghasa a isa apanibar dafarim gatɨ. Egha dughiar Pailat anetaghɨraghasa mɨgeim, ia kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘E tong a gifongezir puvatɨ!’ Egha akɨrim a gasara.
